info.description: Contact defines the Recipient details to which we want to communicate with external parties like Custodians/Brokers
info.title: Aladdin Broker Contact

post.description:
Create one or more contacts to a maximum of 100 per request.
Required fields :- firstName,lastname,ExternalAccountId.
Users needs to have permissions under permType='asContMOD' for using this API.
This API will follow an atomic process where the response will be returned only if all contacts have been created successfully.
If any of the validations fail for even one record, an error will be thrown and none of the contacts will be created.

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

id.description:
Every contact resource will have a unique contact code. 
'id' field stores the contact code.

externalAccountId.description: external_account_id refers to the id of organization.

rpcStatus.description:
The `Status` type defines a logical error model that is suitable for
different programming environments, including REST APIs and RPC APIs. It is
used by [gRPC](https://github.com/grpc). Each `Status` message contains
three pieces of data: error code, error message, and error details.

You can find out more about this error model and how to work with it in the
[API Design Guide](https://cloud.google.com/apis/design/errors).

code.description: The status code, which should be an enum value of [google.rpc.Code][google.rpc.Code].

message.description:
A developer-facing error message, which should be in English. Any
user-facing error message should be localized and sent in the
[google.rpc.Status.details][google.rpc.Status.details] field, or localized by the client.

details.description:
A list of messages that carry the error details.  There is a common set of
message types for APIs to use.

requests.description:
A maximum of 100 contacts can be created in a batch.
First Name, Last Name and external account id are mandatory in all create requests.
Broker Code , Broker External Organization ID should not be provided in any create request
Broker Portfolio Id should only be provided when Broker Type is PORTFOLIO.
requests.title: Create Contacts Request

externalAccountId.description: Represents external acct id to search contact for.
externalAccountId.title: External Account Id

firstName.description: Represents first name to search contact for.
firstName.title: First Name

lastName.description: Represents last name to search contact for.
lastName.title: Last Name

error.description: The error result of the operation in case of failure or cancellation.

output.description: The normal response of the operation in case of success.

contactsQuery.title: Query used to filter against contacts

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of Contacts to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 10
Contacts will be returned. The maximum value is 10; values
above 10 will be coerced to 10.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'ListContacts' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'ListContacts' must match the call that provided the page
token.

nextPageToken.title:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.
(-- aip.dev/beta-blocker: Will be used when pagination is supported  --)

The request message for ContactAPI.UpdateContact.

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.con: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.contact.v1.Contact API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.investment_operations.reference_data.con: This grants access to all endpoints in the investment_operations.reference_data.contact.v1.Contact API
scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
